title: Hotpoint Refrigerator Module Shelf Insert - Clear
description: Hotpoint Refrigerator Module Shelf Insert - Clear ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 69 Reviews PartSelect Number PS2323438 Manufacturer Part Number WR71X10761 The Module Shelf Insert is a complete assembly for the module shelf. This repair is rated as "Easy" by users. Simply remove the old shelf insert and snap the new one into place using the locking tabs. This part is used to hold items in the fridge, and if broken it should be replaced. Refer to your user manual and model number to ensure this part is right for you.

installationInstructions.author: Morgan from Acworth, GA
installationInstructions.title: The clear plastic module shelf insert broke because I dropped it.
installationInstructions.content: I popped out the old one and popped in the new one.
